= pppoe =
* opkg update
* opkg install ppp kmod-pppoe ppp-mod-pppoe
* uci set network.wan.proto=pppoe
* uci set network.wan.username='yougotthisfromyour@isp.su'
* uci set network.wan.password='yourpassword'
* uci commit network
* ifup wan

= shadowsocks =
* opkg update
* opkg install iptables-mod-nat-extra ipset
* reboot
* opkg remove dnsmasq && opkg install dnsmasq-full
* wget https://dl.bintray.com/aa65535/opkg/shadowsocks-libev/3.0.3/OpenWrt/mvebu/libev_4.24-1_mvebu.ipk
* wget https://dl.bintray.com/aa65535/opkg/shadowsocks-libev/3.0.3/OpenWrt/mvebu/libudns_0.4-1_mvebu.ipk
* wget https://dl.bintray.com/aa65535/opkg/shadowsocks-libev/3.0.3/OpenWrt/mvebu/libpcre_8.40-1_mvebu.ipk
* wget https://dl.bintray.com/aa65535/opkg/shadowsocks-libev/3.0.3/OpenWrt/mvebu/libmbedtls_2.4.0-3_mvebu.ipk
* wget https://dl.bintray.com/aa65535/opkg/shadowsocks-libev/3.0.3/OpenWrt/mvebu/libsodium_1.0.11-2_mvebu.ipk
* wget https://dl.bintray.com/aa65535/opkg/shadowsocks-libev/3.0.3/OpenWrt/mvebu/shadowsocks-libev_3.0.3-1_mvebu.ipk
* wget https://dl.bintray.com/aa65535/opkg/shadowsocks-libev/3.0.3/OpenWrt/mvebu/shadowsocks-libev-server_3.0.3-1_mvebu.ipk
* scp libev*.ipk libudns*.ipk libpcre*.ipk libsodium*.ipk libmbedtls*.ipk shadowsocks-libev*.ipk root@openwrt.lan:/tmp
* opkg install libev*.ipk libudns*.ipk libpcre*.ipk libsodium*.ipk libmbedtls*.ipk
* opkg install shadowsocks-libev*.ipk
* vi /etc/shadowsocks.json
    * {
    *    "server": "xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx",
    *    "server_port": 8388,
    *    "local_port": 1080,
    *    "password": "xxxxxxxx",
    *    "method": "aes-256-cfb"
    * }
* vi /etc/init.d/shadowsocks
    * #!/bin/sh /etc/rc.common
    *
    * START=95
    *
    * SERVICE_DAEMONIZE=1
    * CONFIG=/etc/shadowsocks.json
    * DNS=8.8.8.8:53
    * TUNNEL_PORT=5353
    *
    * start() {
    *     ipset -N gfwlist iphash
    *     iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -p tcp -m set --match-set gfwlist dst -j REDIRECT --to-port 1080
    *     service_start /usr/bin/ss-redir -c $CONFIG -b 0.0.0.0
    *     service_start /usr/bin/ss-tunnel -c $CONFIG -b 0.0.0.0 -u -l $TUNNEL_PORT -L $DNS
    * }
    *
    * stop() {
    *     service_stop /usr/bin/ss-redir
    *     service_stop /usr/bin/ss-tunnel
    * }
* chmod +x /etc/init.d/shadowsocks
* /etc/init.d/shadowsocks enable
* /etc/init.d/shadowsocks start
* vi /etc/dnsmasq.conf
    * conf-dir=/etc/dnsmasq.d
* mkdir /etc/dnsmasq.d
* wget https://github.com/cokebar/gfwlist2dnsmasq/releases/download/v0.3_20170222/dnsmasq_gfwlist_ipset.conf
* scp dnsmasq_gfwlist_ipset.conf root@openwrt.lan:/etc/dnsmasq.d
* reboot

= scheduled =
* crontab -e
    * 30 4 * * * sleep 70 && touch /etc/banner && reboot
